thread.section_title: Moris Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Cutie and Classy
thread.title_full: Cutie and Classy - Review of Moris Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: JosephCuyt
title: Cutie and Classy
text: I stayed here for 3 nights without any expectation or atleast a decent warm room as I come to Paris just to Party and by surprise its small cutie and classy room with bath and its very tidy as you can see in the photos, When I arrived I was pleasantly accomodated by the two gentlemen in the reception and almost all the staff are friendly and helpful :). It is located in a nice area so you can see many places by walking:) and if you want to move farther there are 2 metro station in the area which is Republic and Strasbourg St Deniswhich caters alot of lines:), so I definitely will come back and recommend :)
